doc.field: New Hampshire Volunteers in the SCW: Joshua Chamberlain Research Files
New Hampshire Volunteers in the SCW: Joshua Chamberlain Research Files

This small collection contains the research materials assembled by Joshua Chamberlain in his efforts to identify and write about volunteers in the Spanish Civil War who had come from New Hampshire. The collection contains lists, papers, clippings, correspondence, and notes pertaining to Chamberlain's research. Also included are information sheets on each of the volunteers Chamberlain researched.
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
